description: Discover the best hotels in Mornington Peninsula, Australia. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Multi-Award-Winning Mornington Peninsula Wine Lovers' Haven with Hatted Restaurant & Spa
hotels.description: Treat yourself to ultimate luxury in the Mornington Peninsula wine region at this multi-award-winning stay. This whimsical, show-stopping hotel draws you down a rabbit hole of art installations, chef-hatted cuisine and fine wines, all while offering the highest level of service and breathtaking vineyard surrounds. Sit under a 10,000 globe chandelier at Doot Doot Doot, one of Victoria's best restaurants, savour woodfired fare at Rare Hare, cheers to your stay over delectable wines and cocktails at Flaggerooot, melt away during a hot stone massage at the spa and plunge into the 30-metre infinity pool during your acclaimed winery stay.

hotels.title: Boutique Mornington Peninsula Lancemore Winery Stay Just 90 Minutes from Melbourne
hotels.description: Hidden among the Mornington Peninsula's vine-clad hills, sweeping bushland and windswept cliffs lies Lancemore Lindenderry Red Hill, the perfect boutique retreat only 90 minutes from Melbourne's CBD. The porcelain-white boutique hotel stands tall in the centre of 34 acres of romantic greenery, offering guests European-style accommodation with a modern Australian twist, and is the perfect base to experience the region's treasure trove of artisanal distilleries, cherished cool-climate vineyards, seaside villages and tremendous natural beauty. Savour exceptional fare at The Dining Room restaurant or for those who like to sip throughout their trip, the Lancemore Lindenderry Red Hill's cellar door is the place to discover award-winning wines.
